channel.title: Homes on Kenneth Lee
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kenneth Lee

item.description: About me I am from Hong Kong. Fortunately, I received a B.S. in Mathematics and Computer Science from Brigham Young University-Hawaii. Currently, I am pursuing a M.S. in Statistics at UC Davis. My research interests lie in the areas of machine learning, high-dimensional statistics, causal inference, optimization, and data mining. In addition, I fell in love with data science when I first saw the Twitter data popping up on my command prompt.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Brigham Young University-Hawaii: CS 301 Algorithm and Complexity: taught difference equations as a substitute instructor.
